---
title: "Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita"
---

This page explores how life expectancy relates to GDP per capita over time using the Gapminder dataset.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

plt.figure()
for cont in df["continent"].unique():
    sub = df[df["continent"] == cont]
    plt.scatter(sub["gdp_per_capita"], sub["life_expectancy"], label=cont, alpha=0.4)

plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita (log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita (all years)")
plt.legend()
plt.show()
